title: You can make your own 'Netflix and chill' button
text:
Yes, this is a real Netflix button. One press dims the lights and starts the app. (Photo: Netflix)
51 CONNECT 33 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Let's say you had a long day at work, or just want to spend a weekend evening attached to your couch. You may fire up Netflix, turn off the lights, and maybe silence your phones and order takeout.
Or you could just press a button to have this done for you.
Netflix has created the Netflix Switch, a smart home button that -- once pressed -- will dim your lights (if you use smart bulbs) and fire up the streaming media app for immediate viewing. Netflix provided the tools on how to make your own smart home button .
The basic functions dim lights and start the app, but with some extra effort, the Switch can be programmed to work with a third-party food ordering app as well as apps that silence your smartphones.
The only drawback here is you can't buy the finished device. Instead, Netflix offers instructions on how to create your own.
Now if we can just convince them to launch the Netflix Watch .
